entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
